import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Accordion, Button, Col, Row, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' const Project = ({ donation }) => { return ( {Array.from({ length: 6 }).map((_, idx) => ( {donation.name} Description
{donation.description}
 Donation goal= ${donation.donationGoal} ))} ) } export default Project
